item.title: Cracking rendariaka's packedcrackmev1.0
item.author: Author
item.description: This crackme is packed unlike the previous ones. We’ll be unpacking it manually as an exercise. The crackme is rendariaka’s packedcrackmev1.0 Property Value Language C/C++ Platform Windows Difficulty 2.0 Quality 4.0 Arch x86 First run Enter serial number: Entering the incorrect serial causes it to exit. Initial static analysis As by the name suggests, this crackme is packed. +-----------------------------------------------------------------+ |+-------------------------------------------------------------+-+| || Data | || |+-------------------------------------------------------------+^+| +---------------------------------------------------------------+-+ | | Tiny bit of code---+ This is proved again by IDA Pro.
